byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Blackstone's loss was driven by markdowns in the value of the firm's private equity and real estate holdings, as the firm battled a tough environment for investing.
snippet: Blackstone's loss was driven by markdowns in the value of the firm's private equity and real estate holdings, as the firm battled a tough environment for investing.

headline.main: Blackstone Posts $342 Million Loss Amid Tough Markets
